topic.title: So this is it ?
topic.body: Is this the future ? Is this what first people that got on Facebook or Google felt like ?

1592059237_1QPc2ZGPDgxrTJc4jMdEH4XrEb7gQ.body:
> [reichama](#comment_1_19M1Unu2z3j9WyiQ1vcgG6yGnPRmTkUkVe): I see ZeroNet as a foundation that I can build upon. Userbase doesn't matter all that much. Linux has like 2% of the market and it's still awesome.  It's just somewhat troublesome to find content without a search engine.

I'm not sure, but I think Linux has way more than 2% of the market.
